name: BULLYING
description: According to Andrew Mellor (psychologist), the psychosocial condition of bullying victims usually has a lot of tendencies when he feels very depressed he will think about suicide because when he is bullied he tends to be in a helpless position and has great stress, is under fear, and has nothing to do with bullying. courage to fight. The incidence of bullying will also usually affect a person's personality, because usually the personality is influenced by several factors, such as peers, family, social environment, as well as internal factors in the individual's body such as emotional stress.
